messages.subject: Re help!
messages.msgSnippet: Anthony J Bryant wrote Well, for starters, I gotta tell ya... If it s an *ancient* history class you shouldn t be doing anything on samurai, who didn t really
messages.messageBody:
Anthony J Bryant wrote
Well, for starters, I gotta tell ya...

If it's an *ancient* history class you shouldn't be doing anything on
samurai,
who didn't really come into their own until the 11th century or so.

Tony
-------------------------------------------------------------------
maybe I should've elaborated, my course is called ancient history :
history up to the 16th century. My bad. Still, any help would be
appreciated.

~f
